import React from "react"; import { AiFillEdit } from 'react-icons/ai'; import { AiFillDelete } from 'react-icons/ai'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function SearchCard(props) { const URL = '/DescCreche?name=' + props.name return (

{props.name}

Nom : {props.name}

Location : {props.Commune} , {props.Wilaya}

Description : {props.Description}

) } export default SearchCard;
